mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_TITLE FROM TBL_LIKE INNER JOIN TBL_STUDY ON TBL_LIKE.STUDY_NUM = TBL_STUDY.STUDY_NUM WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY LIKE_NUM DESC
SELECT STUDY_NUM, STUDY_CATEGORY, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_DESCRIPT FROM ( SELECT STUDY_NUM, STUDY_CATEGORY, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_DESCRIPT FROM TBL_STUDY ORDER BY STUDY_NUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2
SELECT STUDY_NUM, STUDY_CATEGORY, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_DESCRIPT, STUDY_DEADLINE FROM TBL_STUDY WHERE ROWNUM <= 2 AND STUDY_DEADLINE >= SYSDATE ORDER BY STUDY_DEADLINE
